critique: The executive order is primarily concerned with establishing procedures for classifying and declassifying national security information. The main goal is to ensure the protection of sensitive information while also promoting transparency and accountability. The order aims to instill a sense of responsibility and caution regarding the handling of classified material. The order does not want to instill joy. The order wants to instill fear to those who might disclose information. The order wants to instill disgust at the idea of disclosing information. The order wants to instill surprise at the level of detail.
